skill.name: Skill 1
skill.description: Inflicts **400% fire attribute damage** to single enemy and inflicts **effect1** to the targets for **180 seconds**, **Delay** target by **1 turn**

effect.name: effect1
effect.description: Attack -25%, Fire resist -25%, Debuff resist -10%, last 180 seconds

skill.name: Skill 2
skill.description:
ST3

Grant all Fire attribute allies **effect2** and **guarantee triple attack** for 1 turn

effect.name: effect2
effect.description: Critical Damage +20%, Attack +15%, Auto Attack Damage Cap +150%, all Damage Cap +15%, last 1 turn

resonance.name: Touji resonance
resonance.description: Inflicts **1280%** fire attribute damage to single enemy and grants herself **Resonance Seal effect** for **3 turns**, **Dispel 1 buff** from target and **reset the cooldown of skill 1**

passive.name: passive1
passive.description:
When using Resonance, grant to self **1 stack** of **effect3**\
Effect3: Each stack **increase attack, double attack rate, triple attack rate, damage cap up**. Max 5 stacks (this effect can't be dispelled)

passive.name: passive2
passive.description: Increase own burst value gain speed. When triple attack, reduce skill2 cooldown by **1 turn**
All fire attribute allies auto attack will have **20% chase damage**
passive.name: synchro
